pageTitle: Lovers + Friends Crazy in Love Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 30in / 76cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Hand wash. Lining: 95% polyester/5% elastane. Shell: 88% nylon/12% elastane. Fabric: Stretch lace. A swingy skirt completes the sweet, simple look of a lace mini dress by Lovers + Friends. Draped panels frame the cutout back, and a hidden zip closes the side. Sheer sleeves. Tonal jersey lining. Description Lovers + Friends Dresses > Lovers + Friends Clothing > Day to Night > Dresses > Clothing >
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Inspired by the chic, flirty Los Angeles lifestyle, Lovers + Friends apparel is made for the girl with an eye for laid-back fashion. Offering the perfect balance of day-to-night pieces in bold, sexy silhouettes, Lovers + Friends dresses and tops manage a delightful blend of trend-focused ideas and unique execution. The label gives every new season a fresh eye and distinctive aesthetic, bringing ease to forward fashion and giving Lovers + Friends clothing the edge on effortless style.
